sentences.en: Don't be rash in making your decision.
Don't do anything rash until the feel-ings subside.
sentences.cn: 在冷静下来之前不要鲁莽行事。

sentences.en: Don’t go making any rash decisions about your future!
sentences.cn: 不要对你的未来贸然作决定！

sentences.en: Have you consulted a doctor about your rash?
sentences.cn: 你找医生看过你的疹子 吗 ?

sentences.en: He may break out in a rash when he eats these nuts.
sentences.cn: 他吃了这些坚果可能会长皮疹。

sentences.en: Heat rash rises on his back.
Heat sometimes causes a prickly rash on the skin.
sentences.cn: 热有时使皮肤上生剌痛的疹子.

sentences.en: Her hands have broken out in a rash.
sentences.cn: 她双手忽然出满了皮疹.

sentences.en: I woke up covered in a rash.
sentences.cn: 我醒来时长了一身皮疹。

sentences.en: It was rather rash of you to lend them your car.
sentences.cn: 你把汽车借给他们实在有欠考虑。

sentences.en: My skin has broken out in an itchy rash.
sentences.cn: 我的皮肤上突然长出一片让人发痒的皮疹.

sentences.en: Now a rash of scruffy little shops bordered one side of the street.
sentences.cn: 现在街道的一边排满了各种破旧的小店。

sentences.en: Please Jessie, don’t do anything rash.
sentences.cn: 求你了，杰西，不要草率行事。

sentences.en: The rash most commonly appears on the back.
The rash of accidental shootings underscores how difficult it will be to restore order here.
sentences.cn: 一连串的意外枪击事件凸显了恢复该地区的秩序有多困难。

sentences.en: They believe this confusion is responsible for a rash of suicides this spring.
sentences.cn: 他们认为今年春天一连串的自杀事件是由这次混乱引起的。

sentences.en: When I changed to a new soap I came out in a terrible rash.
sentences.cn: 我换了块新香皂，结果就起了严重的疹子。

words.tran_cn: 轻率地；鲁莽地；无见识地
轻率；皮肤上短暂出现的疹子
轻率的；鲁莽的；不顾后果的
[皮肤]皮疹；突然大量出现的事物

trans.tran_cn: 鲁莽的，轻率的，性急的，不顾后果的
trans.tran_en: (of people or their actions) doing sth that may not be sensible without first thinking about the possible results; done in this way

trans.tran_cn: （皮）疹，爆发，同时大量出现的事件
trans.tran_en: a lot of red spots on someone’s skin, caused by an illness
